common.title: ApplyGogo - AI-powered Employment Platform for Foreigners

hero.description: AI automatically performs Korean-to-English resume conversion, completing a professional English resume (CV) that recruiters notice in minutes.
hero.subText: Start free without credit card ‚Ä¢ First 2 conversions free

cost.description: Receive expert-level results instantly at a reasonable price, without expensive fees and long waiting times.

features.title: Why ApplyGogo?
features.subtitle: We create resumes optimized for the job market, not just simple translations

items.title: AI-Powered Summary
items.description: Gemini Pro analyzes your experience and reconstructs it into 3-4 core achievement-oriented bullet points. Exactly the format recruiters want.

items.title: Professional Translation
items.description: Compare and edit Korean/English simultaneously with Split View. Complete customization with direct editing.

items.title: Premium Templates
items.description: Choose from various templates like Modern, Professional, Executive and download as PDF immediately. Submit to companies right away.

steps.title: Complete in 3 Steps
steps.subtitle: Quick and easy without complex processes

items.title: Upload PDF
items.description: Upload your Korean resume PDF with drag & drop

items.title: AI Conversion
items.description: AI automatically handles summary and translation. Direct editing available.

items.title: Download PDF
items.description: Export as PDF with your favorite template

recommended.item1Description: We provide global standard formats for those unfamiliar with foreign resume formats and CV translation.
recommended.item2Description: Coming across a job opportunity but short on time to convert your resume to English? Just upload your Korean resume and complete it in 5 minutes.
recommended.item3Description: Not just a resume translation, but a sophisticated English resume with polished expressions fitting 'recruitment grammar'.

pricing.title: Simple Passes
pricing.subtitle: Start with a reasonable pass at a price you can't see anywhere else
pricing.footer: * 5 credits deducted for resume generation, free for pass holders or 1 credit for free users for re-translation.

items.q: Q. Does the format of the Korean resume matter?
items.a: Yes, we support most PDF formats, including free formats and downloads from JobKorea/Saramin. AI extracts text and analyzes content, so complex formats are fine.

items.q: Q. Can I edit the translated content?
items.a: Of course. You can freely edit the summarized content and English translation in the editor provided after AI conversion. Refine it delicately by comparing with the original in Split View.

items.q: Q. Is the free plan sufficient?
items.a: We provide 10 credits per month for trial. It's enough to complete and download a resume, but we recommend a pass if you want various templates and unlimited editing.

cta.title: Start Your Global Career Today
cta.subtitle: No more worries about English resumes with ApplyGogo

hero.title:
Your Gateway to the World,
Fast and Reliable
hero.description:
**ApplyGogo** was created for talents who miss out on global career opportunities due to language barriers and complex formats.
Prove your career to the world with the best AI technology.

values.title: Why ApplyGogo?
values.subtitle: Beyond simple translation, we create value that works in the job market

items.title: Global Standard
items.description: Preferred resume formats and expressions vary by country and industry. ApplyGogo AI learns global hiring trends to provide the most effective formats.

items.title: Context-Aware Translation
items.description: Not just a 1:1 literal translation, but a reconstruction into 'Business English' that highlights work performance and capabilities. We handle technical terms and nuances with care.

items.title: Overwhelming Time Saving
items.description: Shortens the work of converting Korean resumes to English from days to just 5 minutes. Invest your time in more important 'interview preparation' and 'job analysis'.

process.title:
Eliminated Complexities,
Focused on the Core
process.description:
Just prepare your existing Korean resume PDF file.
ApplyGogo's AI engine will take care of the rest.
items: Start by uploading PDF without separate sign-up
AI automatically categorizes sections and summarizes content
Real-time preview and intuitive editing editor

cta.title:
Your Career Should Shine
on a Wider Stage
cta.description: Start your global challenge with ApplyGogo right now.

templatesPage.title: Select Template

templateDescriptions.modern: Clean and modern design. Recommended for IT/Startups
templateDescriptions.professional: Professional feel with 2-column layout. Recommended for experienced professionals
templateDescriptions.executive: Strong header and premium design. Recommended for leaders/executives
templateDescriptions.classic: Traditional and formal style. Recommended for large companies/finance
templateDescriptions.minimal: Minimal and sophisticated feel. Recommended for design/creative

processingPage.title: AI Processing
processingPage.description:
AI is analyzing your resume and reconstructing it into an English resume that meets global standards.
Please wait a moment as sophisticated work from text extraction to core achievement selection and professional translation is in progress.
processingPage.warning: For stable analysis, please keep this screen open. (Work may be interrupted if you leave the page)

extracting.label: Step 1: Extraction
extracting.description: Extracting Korean original text from PDF accurately...
extracting.tip: Extracts proper nouns such as company names and school names as they are

refining.label: Step 2: Refining
refining.description: Selecting core experience based on Korean criteria...

translating.label: Step 3: Translation
translating.tip: Translates focal achievements using Action Verbs

doneSection.message: Analysis complete! Moving to the next step...

processingPage.footerTip: üí° 3-Step AI Processing: Actual processing time per step is reflected. By first selecting core experiences based on Korean and then translating them, we provide more accurate and efficient results.

credits.title: Insufficient Credits
credits.description:
You do not have enough credits to proceed with AI resume analysis.
Please refill credits through payment to complete the analysis.
credits.footer: You can retry the task after payment.

feedbackModal.title: Send Feedback & Feature Requests
feedbackModal.description: Please feel free to leave any feedback or features you need.

placeholders.content: Write your feedback here. (e.g., I want more resume templates, I want translation to be faster, etc.)

notifications.success: Thank you for your valuable feedback!
